original_text:
Elvis Lives
Da Memphis fino allo schermo del vostro computer o del vostro smartphone, Elvis Presley si presenta già dalla schermata iniziale della slot, promettendo un’avventura ludico-musicale davvero affascinante.
Come da titolo, questa slot machine è interamente incentrata sulla figura e sul mito di Elvis Presley, indiscusso re del rock con centinaia di milioni di dischi venduti, che continua a scalare le classifiche anche dopo la sua morte avvenuta nel 1976.
Elvis Presley possedeva diverse abitazioni a Las Vegas, e una slot machine che gli rende omaggio sembra un doveroso tributo da parte del mondo dei casinò.
Il compartimento grafico di Elvis Lives non riserva grandi soprese: da questo punto di vista si tratta di una slot piuttosto ordinaria, in cui la cosa che senza dubbio rende il gioco interessante, oltre al gameplay, è la possibilità di ascoltare del buon rock mentre si fanno girare i rulli. Le canzoni del Re infatti suonano costantemente durante tutto il gioco, il che ci pare una scelta ottima per sostenere un’esperienza ludica che, basandoci solamente sulla grafica, non avrebbe tanto da dire.
I simboli comprendono sia i cosiddetti reali, sia quelli coerenti con il tema.
Se si gioca da dispositivi mobili, è consigliabile utilizzare Chrome per i dispositivi Android e Safari per quelli iOS.
Caratteristiche della slot
La software house WMS ha scelto per questa sua slot machine una struttura di gioco molto tradizionale: Elvis Lives presenta infatti i canonici cinque rulli e 12 righe, e si possono effettuare le proprie puntate su ben 60 linee di pagamento.
Il range di scommessa per Elvis Lives va da un minimo di 50 centesimi fino a un massimo di 100 € per giro, cifra quest’ultima che potrebbe soddisfare anche gli high rollers.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP i return to player) di questa slot machine si attesta su un abbastanza deludente 95,86%, al di sotto delle media, tuttavia se si è fortunati si possono ottenere dei buoni guadagni prestando attenzione ai numerosi bonus in denaro.
È presente la funzione Autoplay, grazia alla quale si possono impostare i giri automatici, per chi non intende lanciare ogni singolo giro.
Una caratteristica particolare di Elvis Lives è data dal fatto che i rulli 2, 3 e 4 si possono unire a formare una sorta di rullo unico su cui compaiono dei simboli giganti.
Funzionalità speciali di Elvis Lives
Le funzionalità speciali di Elvis Lives sono attivate dai simboli “Attiva Bonus” che valgono come Scatter e possono attivare una delle quattro opzioni di gioco:

Giri Gratis Aloha: permette di ottenere 7 giri gratuiti e di poter usufruire di due jolly che potranno fungere anche da moltiplicatori
Giri Gratis TCB: offre 5 giri gratuiti e attraverso 3 simboli raffiguranti degli anelli di diverso colore regala moltiplicatori o ulteriori free spins.
Bonus selezionatore Tuta da ginnastica: è un vero e proprio mini-gioco in cui si ha la possibilità di vincere il jackpot.
Bonus Elvis Lives: sulla schermata di gioco appare una scritta che riporta il nome della slot “Elvis Lives”, a seconda di quante lettere di questa scritta si illuminano verrà assegnato un diverso premio in denaro.

raw_translation.response:
Elvis Lives
From Memphis to the screen of your computer or smartphone, Elvis Presley is already present on the main screen of this slot game, promising an exciting music-filled adventure. As the title suggests, this slot machine is entirely focused on the life and legend of the undisputed King of Rock, Elvis Presley, who has sold hundreds of millions of records and continues to top the charts even after his death in 1976. Elvis Presley had several homes in Las Vegas, and a slot machine honoring his legacy seems like a fitting tribute from the casino world. 

The graphics in Elvis Lives do not hold many surprises and are rather standard. However, what makes the game interesting, besides the gameplay, is the opportunity to listen to excellent rock music while spinning the reels. The King's songs play constantly throughout the game, which is an excellent choice to support the player's experience. 

The symbols include both the so-called Royals and those consistent with the theme. If playing on mobile devices, it is recommended to use Chrome for Android devices and Safari for iOS ones. 

Slot Features 
The software developer WMS has chosen a traditional game structure for this slot game, with the standard five reels and 12 rows. Players can bet on 60 paylines, with a betting range from a minimum of 50 cents up to a maximum of €100 per spin, which could satisfy even the high rollers. However, the theoretical return to player (RTP) of this slot machine is rather disappointing at 95.86%, which is below average. Nevertheless, with some luck, players can obtain good winnings by paying attention to the many cash bonuses available. 

The game also offers an Autoplay function, allowing players to set the automatic spins for those who do not wish to launch each spin manually. A unique feature of Elvis Lives is the ability for the second, third, and fourth reels to combine and form a singular reel on which giant symbols appear. 

Special Features of Elvis Lives 
The special features of Elvis Lives are activated by the "Bonus Activator" symbols, which act as Scatter symbols and can trigger one of the four game options: 

-"Aloha" Free Spins: allows players to obtain seven free spins and benefit from two wild symbols that can also act as multipliers 
-"TCB" Free Spins: offers five free spins and through three symbols depicting rings of different colors, offers multipliers or additional free spins. 
-"Track Suit Selector" Bonus: an actual mini-game in which players have the chance to win the jackpot.
-Elvis Lives Bonus: the game screen displays the words "Elvis Lives." Depending on how many letters of this phrase light up, you will be awarded a different cash prize. 

In conclusion, Elvis Lives is a rockin' slot game with an exciting tribute to the one and only King of Rock - Elvis Presley. With excellent music and exciting gameplay features, this game is perfect for experienced gamblers who are looking for some extra excitement to their spins!

raw_translation.response:
Elvis Lives
From Memphis to your computer or smartphone screen, Elvis Presley appears from the initial slot screen, promising a truly fascinating musical-gambling adventure.
As the title suggests, this slot machine is entirely centered around the figure and myth of Elvis Presley, the undisputed king of rock with hundreds of millions of records sold, who continues to climb the charts even after his death in 1976.
Elvis Presley owned several homes in Las Vegas, and a slot machine that pays homage to him seems like a rightful tribute from the world of casinos.
The graphics of Elvis Lives do not offer any big surprises. From this point of view, it is a rather ordinary slot machine, in which the thing that undoubtedly makes the game interesting, in addition to the gameplay, is the possibility of listening to good rock while spinning the reels. The King's songs play constantly throughout the game, which seems like an excellent choice to support a gaming experience that, based solely on graphics, wouldn't say much.
The symbols include both the so-called playing cards and those consistent with the theme.
If playing from mobile devices, it is recommended to use Chrome for Android devices and Safari for iOS ones.
Features of the slot
For this slot machine, the software house WMS chose a very traditional gameplay structure: Elvis Lives indeed presents the canonical five reels and 12 rows, and you can bet on 60 paylines.
The betting range for Elvis Lives goes from a minimum of 50 cents to a maximum of €100 per spin, the latter figure could satisfy even the high rollers.
The theoretical return to player (RTP) of this slot machine stands at a rather disappointing 95.86%, below average, however, if lucky, you can get good gains by paying attention to the many cash bonus features.
The Autoplay function is present, which allows you to set automatic spins for those who don't intend to launch each spin manually.
A special feature of Elvis Lives is given by the fact that reels 2, 3, and 4 can join together to form a sort of unique reel on which giant symbols appear.
Special features of Elvis Lives
The special features of Elvis Lives are activated by the "Activate Bonus" symbols that are worth as Scatters and can activate one of the four game options:

Aloha Free Spins: allows you to get 7 free spins and to take advantage of two wilds that can also act as multipliers.
TCB Free Spins: offers 5 free spins and through 3 symbols depicting rings of different colors, it gives multipliers or additional free spins.
Jumpsuit Selector Bonus: it is a real mini-game in which you have the chance to win the jackpot.
Elvis Lives Bonus: the name of the slot "Elvis Lives" will appear on the game screen, depending on how many letters of this name light up, a different cash prize will be awarded.

Players can bet on 60 paylines, with a betting range from a minimum of 50 cents up to a maximum of €100 per spin, which could satisfy even the high rollers. However, the theoretical return to player (RTP) of this slot machine is rather disappointing at 95.86%, which is below average. Nevertheless, with some luck, players can obtain good winnings by paying attention to the many cash bonuses available. 

The game also offers an Autoplay function, allowing players to set the automatic spins for those who do not wish to launch each spin manually. A unique feature of Elvis Lives is the ability for the second, third, and fourth reels to combine and form a singular reel on which giant symbols appear. 

Special Features of Elvis Lives 
The special features of Elvis Lives are activated by the "Bonus Activator" symbols, which act as Scatter symbols and can trigger one of the four game options: 

-"Aloha" Free Spins: allows players to obtain seven free spins and benefit from two wild symbols that can also act as multipliers 
-"TCB" Free Spins: offers five free spins and through three symbols depicting rings of different colors, offers multipliers or additional free spins. 
-"Track Suit Selector" Bonus: an actual mini-game in which players have the chance to win the jackpot.
-Elvis Lives Bonus: the game screen displays the words "Elvis Lives." Depending on how many letters of this phrase light up, you will be awarded a different cash prize. 

In conclusion, Elvis Lives is a rockin' slot game with an exciting tribute to the one and only King of Rock - Elvis Presley. With excellent music and exciting gameplay features, this game is perfect for experienced gamblers who are looking for some extra excitement to their spins!

Below is a review of the game "Elvis Lives".

Please provide an FAQ:

- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.

- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Elvis Lives
From Memphis to the screen of your computer or smartphone, Elvis Presley is already present on the main screen of this slot game, promising an exciting music-filled adventure. As the title suggests, this slot machine is entirely focused on the life and legend of the undisputed King of Rock, Elvis Presley, who has sold hundreds of millions of records and continues to top the charts even after his death in 1976. Elvis Presley had several homes in Las Vegas, and a slot machine honoring his legacy seems like a fitting tribute from the casino world. 

The graphics in Elvis Lives do not hold many surprises and are rather standard. However, what makes the game interesting, besides the gameplay, is the opportunity to listen to excellent rock music while spinning the reels. The King's songs play constantly throughout the game, which is an excellent choice to support the player's experience. 

The symbols include both the so-called Royals and those consistent with the theme. If playing on mobile devices, it is recommended to use Chrome for Android devices and Safari for iOS ones. 

Slot Features 
The software developer WMS has chosen a traditional game structure for this slot game, with the standard five reels and 12 rows. Players can bet on 60 paylines, with a betting range from a minimum of 50 cents up to a maximum of €100 per spin, which could satisfy even the high rollers. However, the theoretical return to player (RTP) of this slot machine is rather disappointing at 95.86%, which is below average. Nevertheless, with some luck, players can obtain good winnings by paying attention to the many cash bonuses available. 

The game also offers an Autoplay function, allowing players to set the automatic spins for those who do not wish to launch each spin manually. A unique feature of Elvis Lives is the ability for the second, third, and fourth reels to combine and form a singular reel on which giant symbols appear. 

Special Features of Elvis Lives 
The special features of Elvis Lives are activated by the "Bonus Activator" symbols, which act as Scatter symbols and can trigger one of the four game options: 

-"Aloha" Free Spins: allows players to obtain seven free spins and benefit from two wild symbols that can also act as multipliers 
-"TCB" Free Spins: offers five free spins and through three symbols depicting rings of different colors, offers multipliers or additional free spins. 
-"Track Suit Selector" Bonus: an actual mini-game in which players have the chance to win the jackpot.
-Elvis Lives Bonus: the game screen displays the words "Elvis Lives." Depending on how many letters of this phrase light up, you will be awarded a different cash prize. 

In conclusion, Elvis Lives is a rockin' slot game with an exciting tribute to the one and only King of Rock - Elvis Presley. With excellent music and exciting gameplay features, this game is perfect for experienced gamblers who are looking for some extra excitement to their spins!
